sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import {ReactComponent as ImageOne} from '../../images/svg-1.svg' import {InfoContainer, InfoWrapper, InfoRow, Column1, Column2, TextWrapper, TopLine, Subtitle, ImgWrap, Heading} from './InfoElements' import { Button } from '../ButtonElement' const InfoSection = ({lightBg, id, imgStart, topLine, lightText, headline, darkText, description, buttonLabel, img, alt, primary, dark}) => { return ( <> {topLine} {headline} {description} ) } export default InfoSection
